column5: Dock your boat in a private slip at this 1BR/1BA bungalow, then enjoy views of Laguna Madre Bay from the spacious sundeck. Youâ€™re just a short drive to South Padre Island, Schlitterbahn Waterpark, and all the dining spots of Port Isabel. Sleeps 4.
